column1: #: description: Inclusive $[\psi\text{(2S)/J/}\psi]_{\rm Pb-Pb}$ and $[\psi\text{(2S)/J/}\psi]_{\rm Pb-Pb}\;/\;[\psi\text{(2S)/J/}\psi]_{\rm pp}$ ratios as a function of centrality for $p_{\rm T}<3$ GeV/$c$. Statistical and systematic uncertainties are reported when the value is not given as an upper limit.
